What value of RB is required to set VCE to 8 V?

To find the required value of \( R_B \) to set \( V_{CE} \) to 8 V in the common-emitter configuration, we can use the small-signal equivalent circuit of the transistor and the given parameters. The small-signal equivalent circuit for the common-emitter configuration is as follows:

\[
\begin{aligned}
&V_{CE} = V_{CC} - V_{BE} - \frac{V_{CE}}{R_C} \cdot R_E \\
&V_{BE} = V_{BB} - V_{CE} - \frac{V_{CE}}{R_E} \cdot R_C
\end{aligned}
\]
